properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 19.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ FROM AIRCRAFT
IN VICINITY 52-00N 022-00W. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO UK COAST GUARD, PHONE: 4434 4382 0025,
FAX: 4413 2924 4547, E-MAIL: UKMRCC@HMCG.GOV.UK.
